dia.str: I'm looking for work. Do you need help with anything?

I don't need anything. All the jobs around the house are done. You could say that now I can just lie down and rest since I've nothing to do. But I can't. Because of the racket the forest troll is making I can't sleep. I haven't slept in days. The troll keeps on moaning and moaning. I took a good look at it and I think it's sick. I don't know what to do. I need to sleep. But I'm not going to leave my home. Who would guard my belongings? And there isn't any decent place to stay in all Darkwood.
Would you? I'll reward you greatly if you could make that troll stop!
